metadata.synopsis: A guard in the guard room of Moonrise Tower. They're growing accustomed to living and fighting alongside monstrous races.

1.speaker: Zealot Iogar
1.text: You'd find better lodgings out in the war camp, True Soul.

0.speaker: Zealot Iogar
0.text: I know we're all one under the Absolute, but you do not want to bunk with an ogre.
0.context: NodeContext: Emphatic - this guard has seen things

2.speaker: Zealot Iogar
2.text: Better to bunk with a beast than do battle with one, I suppose. Praise the Absolute.
